alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 31 at 4:07PM MDT until April 02 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM SATURDAY TO 9 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected in the mountains. Up to 60 mph possible in the Lander Foothills. Gusts of 70 to 80 mph possible along Wyoming Highway 28 at Red Canyon. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...From 9 AM Saturday to 9 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest potential for high wind in Lander is late Saturday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Use caution if driving. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East
